snippet: Ticket sellers who canceled sales to Yankees home games, particularly for the final home game of the regular season, and then tried to resell the same tickets for far more will face penalties.
abstract: StubHub announces that it will penalize ticket sellers who canceled transactions for seats at Yankees home games in 2014, particularly the final home game of the regular season, and then tried to resell the same tickets for far more; move will hit scalpers trying to capitalize on Derek Jeter's retirement announcement.
lead_paragraph: Ticket sellers who canceled sales to Yankees home games, particularly for the final home game of the regular season, and then tried to resell the same tickets for far more will face penalties.

headline.main: StubHub to Penalize Ticket Sellers Trying to Cash In on Jeter
headline.print_headline: A Losing Gamble for Ticket Sellers
